channel.title: How to add this? | rep++
channel.description: how can i add a system who gives you a title while you have done something? example: after chopped 100 tree's you get the title "Lumberjack" or something... and a message who say like: "congratz, you have done the challenge" or yeah... :P is that hard? does anyone know how to do it, or know about a tutorial for it? rep++ if you help me and it work :)

item.title: How to add this? | rep++
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

What I wrote below was in the forum quick reply box and most likely has flaws but the goal is that you hopefully get the point.

[code]public class Player {
public int treeschopped = 0;

public void incTreeChopped() {
treeschopped++
}
}

public class thatinvolveswoodcutting {
public void ChopTreeMethod() {
player.incTreeChop();
if(player.treeschopped >= 100) {
player.sendmessagesayingyoucut100trees();
player.setTreeschopped(0);
}
}
}[/code]

Can also read : http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/index.html

Read full topic
